title: Little Man, What Now? (1934) Frank Borzage Hans Fallada
description:
Hans Fallada's classic brought to the screen by a talented group of actors. This is a serious film that deals with a married couple's difficulty surviving in an uncaring society experiencing economic collapse.

Although other viewers think the movie is set in the Nazi era, a closer view makes clear that it is set immediately after WWI, probably about 1919. It is interesting to watch this back-to-back with Modern Times (1936), which was probably inspired by it. 

There was a 1933 German version, which I have been unable to find.

Please seed this, I want to upload other stuff in future
